I0D-in: This wand has 7 charges. While holding it,  you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges and create a harmless burst of multicolored light at a point you can see up to 60 feet away. The burst of light is accompanied by a crackling noise that can be heard up to 300 feet away. The light is as bright as a torch flame but lasts only a second.
I1D-in: The wand regains 1d6  + 1 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the wand's last charge,  roll a d20. On a 1,  the wand erupts in a harmless pyrotechnic display and is destroyed.
